thread.title: Dave

author: Dave
title: Dave
text: Traded my car in +they owed me Â£5,820 pounds + promised me the money would be in my account on Monday afternoon. No money on Monday + started phone calls trying to find somebody to help me. Was Tuesday morning before I finally got somebody to assist me + then I had to go back to the shop to finish it - told them I would be taking legal advice + wanted my car back before they finally paid me. Incompetent idiots .
